All functions

annfactor()
Calculate Annuity Factors with Survival and Cost-of-Living Adjustments
get_pmt0()
#' npv calculates the present value of future cashflows (cf) #' #' @param rate Annual discount rate (scalar double). #' @param cf A list of cash flows in n=length(cf) number of years #' #' @return Numeric value. #' @export #' #' @examples #' cf <- c(100, 200, 300, 400, 500, 600) #' npv(0.05, cf) # 1704.37 #' @export npv <- function(rate, cf) df <- (1+rate)^(-(1:(length(cf)))) # Discount factor in each year based on rate pv <- sum(cf * df) # The sum of the product of cash flow and discount factor in each year is PV return(pv) #Annuity factor for current retirees' benefits #We need this function to calculate the annuity factors when a constant COLA is granted after the first year #' @export
get_pv()
Calculate Present Value Factor
get_pv_cf_roll()
get_pv_cf_roll returns the remaining present value of future cash flows (cf) in every year forward
